title: Master Alta Formazione sui dati Ed.2
descriptionlong: 16-weeks intensive learning program on data literacy, statistics, data visualization, and storytelling. I taught lessons on data formats, data sources, GSheet basic and advanced uses, Open Refine and data cleaning, Google Data Studio and dashboards, and data visualization with Datawrapper, Flourish, and Infogram. I also supported students in developing their group projects with the program's data partners: Fondazione Compagnia di San Paolo; Produzioni dal Basso; and SeaWatch.

title: 2021 Fellowship Program, Marimekko Cohort
descriptionlong: The fellowship guided 4 East African NGOs in creating a data storytelling project to communicate their own datasets. I taught sessions on data storytelling techniques and the use of Datawrapper, based on Data4Change's program.

title: Communication of Statistics and Data Business Analytics
descriptionlong: The course covered the main skills related to data communication, such as the design of a data communication product, from the sourcing and interpretation of data to their graphic representation; and the creation of data visualizations, charts, and dashboards using the main tools of the industry. The course comprised of both frontal lessons and practical exercises.

title: Data Feminism Workshop on critical data practices
descriptionlong: A two-day workshop for women's rights organizations from Spain and Greece on data literacy for communicators, with a focus on how to work with data by applying the Data feminism critique throughout the different phases of a data project's workflow. The workshop combined both theory and practical activities.

title: Master Alta Formazione sui dati Ed.1
descriptionlong: 16-weeks intensive learning program on data literacy, statistics, data visualization, and storytelling. I taught lessons on data formats, data sources, GSheet basic and advanced uses, Open Refine and data cleaning, and data visualization with Datawrapper, Flourish, Infogram and RawGraph. I also supported students in developing their group projects with the program's data partners: Fondazione Compagnia di San Paolo; MAXXI Museo nazionale delle arti del XXI secolo; LWT3; and Medici Senza Frontiere.

title: Graphic infotainment: comunicare con i dati
descriptionlong: An intensive 8-weeks online program for female SME female entrepreneurs focused on open-source tools to incorporate data analysis and data communication in their brand marketing strategy.

title: Data Storytelling - MA Course
descriptionlong: I taught a 10-hour module on Data Storytelling in the Data Science MA at Bologna Business School.

title: Data for Good - Mentorship Program
descriptionlong: The mentorship consisted of a self-paced online learning program and of a three-day intensive live Data Camp. At the end of the mentorship, the participating NGOs developed visualization and storytelling prototypes to communicate their datasets.

title: Introduction to Data - Course
descriptionlong: An introductory data literacy course, covering topics such as data formats, data cleaning, basic statistics, Google Spreadsheet formulas, and Pivot Tables.

title: Data Visualization - Course
descriptionlong: A course on the theory and practice of data visualization, including tutorials on how to use the tools Datawrapper, Floruish, and ArcGIS Online to create interactive charts and maps.

title: Create an Infographic - Course
descriptionlong: A course with a step-by-step process to create an infographic, including tutorials on how to use the tools Canva and Infogram.

title: Let's play with data from Wikipedia - Webinar
descriptionlong: A 30-minute crash course on extracting data from Wikipedia into a Google Spreadsheet, through Wikidata queries.

title: Where to find data - Webinar
descriptionlong: A 30-minute crash course on the different types of data sources, from open data portals to scraping and APIs.

title: Cleaning data with Open Refine - Webinar
descriptionlong: A 60-minute crash course on using Open Refine to clean and enhance data, including its most advanced features, such as LOD reconciliation, GREL, and clustering algorithms.

title: Data visualizations in vector graphics with RawGraphs - Webinar
descriptionlong: A 60-minute crash course on vector graphics and on using the open-source tools RawGraphs and Inkscape to create and edit data visualizations in the .SVG format.

title: Create your first map - Webinar
descriptionlong: A 60-minute crash course on maps: from geodata formats to projections, from choosing a map type to using online tools such as Datawrapper, ArcGIS Online, and Flourish .

title: Make your data visualizations more inclusive - Webinar
descriptionlong: A 60-minute crash course on making sure data visualizations are accessible and inclusive.

title: Data Literacy and Data Viz - Programs for NGOs and businesses
descriptionlong: I guided company employees and not-for-profit employees through custom data literacy and data visualization learning programs. In this context, I worked with Generali, Expleo, Sapere Digitale and A Scuola di Open Coesione.

descriptionlong: A webinar on preparing spreadsheets for your projects..

title: Data4Change 2015 Beirut Design Sprint
descriptionlong: A 5-days design sprint for Civil Society Organizations from Syria, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Gulf region, to prototype a data storytelling product to communicate each CSO's data. As a floating mentor, I provided support to the various groups.

title: Silk's Summer Webinar: Cleaning and enhancing datasets with the Silk data team
descriptionlong: The webinar focuses on cleaning and enhancing data. In the webinar, I share tips, tricks, and tools I use to make data look pretty.

title: Spatial data visualization
descriptionlong: A one-day seminar on the theory and practice of visualizing spatial data, for PhD students in Geography of the University of Rome.
